original_solution_mapping.L1: Out of the first 100 balls, Ralph was able to hit 2/5 of them and not able to hit 3/5 of them, 3/5 x 100 = 60 tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Out of the next 75 balls, Ralph was able to hit 1/3 of them and not able to hit 2/3 of them, 2/3 x 75 = 50 tennis balls that Ralph didn't hit.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Combined, Ralph was not able to hit 60 + 50 = <<60+50=110>>110 tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 25.
    Returns: the total number of tennis balls Ralph did not hit.
    """
    # L1
    first_batch_total_balls = 100 # first 100 balls
    not_hit_first_batch_fraction = Fraction(3, 5) # not able to hit 3/5 of them
    not_hit_first_batch_count = not_hit_first_batch_fraction * first_batch_total_balls

    # L2
    second_batch_total_balls = 75 # next 75 tennis balls
    not_hit_second_batch_fraction = Fraction(2, 3) # not able to hit 2/3 of them
    not_hit_second_batch_count = not_hit_second_batch_fraction * second_batch_total_balls

    # L3
    total_not_hit_balls = not_hit_first_batch_count + not_hit_second_batch_count

    # FA
    answer = total_not_hit_balls
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Out of the first {first_batch_total_balls} balls, Ralph was able to hit 2/5 of them and not able to hit {not_hit_first_batch_fraction} of them, {not_hit_first_batch_fraction} x {first_batch_total_balls} = <<{not_hit_first_batch_fraction}*{first_batch_total_balls}={not_hit_first_batch_count}>>{not_hit_first_batch_count} tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.

Out of the next {second_batch_total_balls} balls, Ralph was able to hit 1/3 of them and not able to hit {not_hit_second_batch_fraction} of them, {not_hit_second_batch_fraction} x {second_batch_total_balls} = <<{not_hit_second_batch_fraction}*{second_batch_total_balls}={not_hit_second_batch_count}>>{not_hit_second_batch_count} tennis balls that Ralph didn't hit.

Combined, Ralph was not able to hit {not_hit_first_batch_count} + {not_hit_second_batch_count} = <<{not_hit_first_batch_count}+{not_hit_second_batch_count}={total_not_hit_balls}>>{total_not_hit_balls} tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Out of the first 100 balls, Ralph was able to hit 2/5 of them and not able to hit 3/5 of them, 3/5 x 100 = <<3/5*100=60>>60 tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Out of the next 75 balls, Ralph was able to hit 1/3 of them and not able to hit 2/3 of them, 2/3 x 75 = <<2/3*75=50>>50 tennis balls that Ralph didn't hit.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Combined, Ralph was not able to hit 50 + 50 = <<50+50=100>>100 tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'not_hit_second_batch_count' (value: 50) was used instead of 'not_hit_first_batch_count' (value: 60).
